name: unspent
content:
unspent adjective
(MONEY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unspent money has not been used to pay for something: Millions have disappeared in unspent funds. Much of the money remains unspent.
More examplesFewer examplesThe committee will assess what to do with the unspent funds.Individual departments did not have the right to carry forward unspent money from one year to the next.

law
